entry.title: Why Not Do it For All of Us?
entry.content:
I created a repo in hopes of it becoming the most starred repo on GitHub. That’s a pretty audacious goal, I know. Bootstrap currently has over 64,000 stars, making it the most popular repository on GitHub.

Just check out @mdo’s profile page:

So many stars! What a badass. Who doesn’t want cred like that? Now we can all have it, or at least part of it. We’re not going to make an important product, but we can get a lot of stars â˜»

Please join me in my quest to the top. Do it for me. Do it for yourself. Do it for all of us.
